name: power-radix
description: Library for converting numbers from one radix representation (encoding) to another, with optional custom defined encodings. Inspired by rubyworks/radix.

scripts.test: npm run lint; DEBUG=power-radix* NODE_PATH=./ lab -c
scripts.test-cov: mkdir coverage; touch coverage/coverage.html; rm coverage/coverage.html; NODE_PATH=./ lab -c -r html > coverage/coverage.html; open -a 'Google Chrome' coverage/coverage.html

author: Casey Flynn <cflynn.us@gmail.com>
